title: Goodbye Tahm Kench
body:
With Patch coming out very soon and nothing being done about the absolutely (insert word for mentally insufficient) nerfs riot has slated for a near 40% wr support, I am confident that I will not be playing one of my favorite champions again, both thematically and previously in play style (you know when his w didn't get the shot nerfed out of it every patch, 12 patches in a row due to pro players and was actually useful)
Very sad. :'(
